Summary: [Cart page] The + and - symbols at the quantity picker are mixed up

Steps to reproduce.1: Go to the Home page of Silicon Sofas
Steps to reproduce.2: Click on any Navigation bar category
Steps to reproduce.3: Click on any product at the result page
Steps to reproduce.4: Click the icon to add the product to the cart at the Product detail page
Steps to reproduce.5: Change the quantity of the product by using quantity picker (to increase quantity - use +, to decrease quantity - use -)

Expected result: The quantity is increased after clicking + at the quantity picker, the quantity is decreased after clicking - at the quantity picker
Actual result: The quantity is increased after clicking - at the quantity picker. The quantity is decreased after clicking + at the quantity picker

Summary: [Checkout page] The Total and Subtotal price is not calculated in accordance with total quantity of the product

Steps to reproduce.1: Go to the Home page of Silicon Sofas
Steps to reproduce.2: Add any item to the Cart
Steps to reproduce.3: Change the item quantity to more than 1
Steps to reproduce.5: Observe the Total and Subtotal price

Expected result: Total and Subtotal price reflects the quantity of item
Actual result: Total  and Subtotal price is calculated as for the quantity = 1. although the quantity is more than 1
